page.title: 14Gladstone Road
page.content: I live in a old semi detached house in Gladstone Road ,South Wimbledon.I go to Pelham Primary School which is not far away.I only have to cross three roads to get there.Tesco's is a large supermarket opposite my house and we often shop there as well at the other shops on Wimbledon Broadway which is at the end of my road.South Wimbledon and Wimbledon Stations are quite close by.There are two theatres and a cinema on the Broadway.We went to the cinema once to see "Jungle Book".We also have two parks quite near that we often visit and a library from which we borrow books.
